revised_title: Conversaziones and Reception: A Review of Scientific Exhibits and Discoveries in 1966
tldr: The 1966 Conversaziones and Reception featured various scientific exhibits and discoveries across multiple disciplines, including biology, chemistry, physics, environmental science, medicine, astronomy, zoology, genetics, ecology, and geology. Researchers showcased their work on enzyme synthesis, lysosomes, lysozyme, chromaffin cells, organ cultures, marine animals, environmental temperature response, termite nests, poisonous moths, disease resistance, potato and stone separation, on-line analysis of tremor, the Gunn Effect, hyperbolic cooling towers, and the Anglo-French Concord supersonic airliner.
